Detailed Description

Schema Validator class. Provides xml schema validation of server responses. Extends the Validator class and implements the IValidator interface.
Author:
Bas van Gaalen
Since:
1.0

Member Function Documentation

ValidatorXsd.run ( Response $  oResponse  ) 

Run the validator on given Response object. Should always return a boolean.

Parameters:
$oResponse Response The Response object as it is returned by the server.
Returns:
bool True if everything validates, false if not.
Exceptions:
ValidatorException 
Since:
1.0

Implements IValidator.
